amendment.description: An amendment numbered 86 printed in the Congressional Record to require the Secretary to consult with certain Secretaries about the plan and ensure such plan will not result in the sale of petroleum products drawn down from the Reserve to Iran, China, North Korea, or Russia.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires the Secretary to consult with certain Secretaries about the plan and ensure such plan will not result in the sale of petroleum products drawn down from the Reserve to Iran, China, North Korea, or Russia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gottheimer amendment (A033) Agreed to by recorded vote: 418 - 12 (Roll no. 58).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Gottheimer.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gottheimer amendment (A033) Agreed to by recorded vote: 418 - 12 (Roll no. 58).
